Entangle.effect: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square, restraining targets in the area.

Mage Hand.effect: Create a spectral hand that can manipulate and interact with objects.

Eldritch Blast.effect: Unleash a bolt of force damage at a target within range.

Cure Wounds.effect: Restore HP equal to 1d8 + spellcasting modifier to a creature you touch.

Shield.effect: Instantly raise your AC by +5 until the start of your next turn.

Bless.effect: Add 1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws for 3 creatures.

Hex.effect: Target takes extra 1d6 necrotic damage when hit; disadvantage on one ability check type.

Thunderwave.effect: 15-foot cube shockwave. Pushes creatures and deals thunder damage.

Silence.effect: Creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of magical silence.

Fireball.effect: A fiery explosion deals 8d6 fire damage in a 20-foot radius.

Dispel Magic.effect: End one spell effect of 3rd level or lower.

Conjure Animals.effect: Summon fey spirits that take the form of beasts to fight for you.

Banishment.effect: Target is banished to another plane if it fails a CHA save.

Wall of Fire.effect: Creates a 60-foot wall of flame. Creatures take fire damage entering or ending in wall.

Raise Dead.effect: Return a dead creature to life after 10 days, with penalties.

Guidance.effect: Touch a creature to add 1d4 to one ability check of its choice.

Prestidigitation.effect: Create minor magical effects like cleaning, flavoring, or visual tricks.

Sacred Flame.effect: Flame-like radiance targets one creature, dealing radiant damage (DEX save).

Faerie Fire.effect: Outline creatures in a 20-ft cube with light. Grants advantage on attacks.

Healing Word.effect: Heals a creature for 1d4 + spellcasting modifier. Bonus action.

Witch Bolt.effect: Create a beam of crackling energy. Deals 1d12 lightning and continues on hit.

Pass Without Trace.effect: Grants +10 Stealth and prevents tracking for group.

Lesser Restoration.effect: Ends one disease or condition affecting a creature.

Scorching Ray.effect: Create 3 rays of fire, each dealing 2d6 fire damage on hit.

Counterspell.effect: Interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell.

Spirit Guardians.effect: Summon spectral guardians. Enemies take radiant/necrotic damage when entering area.

Plant Growth.effect: Enrich or entangle plants to impede movement or enhance crops.

Phantasmal Killer.effect: Create a fear-based illusion that deals psychic damage over time.

Freedom of Movement.effect: Target is unaffected by difficult terrain or restraints.

Greater Restoration.effect: Ends one debilitating effect like charm, petrification, curse, or level drain.

Vicious Mockery.effect: Psychically assault a creature with insults; 1d4 psychic and disadvantage on next attack.

Druidcraft.effect: Create minor nature effects like predicting weather or causing plants to bloom.

Toll the Dead.effect: Target hears a dolorous bell. Deals 1d8 or 1d12 necrotic if wounded.

Ice Knife.effect: Create a shard of ice; explodes in AoE upon hit. Cold damage.

Heroism.effect: Creature is immune to fear and gains temporary HP each round.

Beast Bond.effect: Form a telepathic link with a willing beast.

Mirror Image.effect: Create illusory duplicates to confuse attackers.

Spike Growth.effect: Turns terrain into sharp spikes. Movement causes piercing damage.

Shatter.effect: Creates a sudden loud noise, damaging creatures and objects.

Blink.effect: At the end of each turn, you may vanish into the Ethereal Plane.

Revivify.effect: Return a creature that has died within the last minute to life.

Staggering Smite.effect: Next melee hit deals extra psychic damage and may stagger target.

Greater Invisibility.effect: Turn invisible without breaking on attack or spell use.

Wall of Thorns.effect: Thick wall of thorns blocks vision and movement, dealing piercing damage.

Light.effect: Object sheds bright light in 20 ft radius for 1 hour.

Poison Spray.effect: Puff of noxious gas deals 1d12 poison damage (CON save).

Produce Flame.effect: Create flame in hand for light or ranged attack (1d8 fire).

Ensnaring Strike.effect: Next hit restrains target in vines unless STR save.

Feather Fall.effect: Slow falling speed for up to 5 falling creatures.

Darkness.effect: Create a 15 ft sphere of magical darkness.

Misty Step.effect: Teleport 30 ft to a location you can see.

Barkskin.effect: Target's minimum AC becomes 16 for 1 hour.

Haste.effect: Double speed, +2 AC, extra action. Ends with stun.

Spirit Shroud.effect: Add radiant/necrotic/cold to weapon attacks; slow nearby enemies.

Call Lightning.effect: Summon storm cloud that deals 3d10 lightning per bolt.

Dimension Door.effect: Teleport self and one other to a known location within 500 ft.

Death Ward.effect: Target drops to 1 HP instead of 0 once during the duration.

Tree Stride.effect: Step into a tree and teleport to another within 500 ft.

Heal.effect: Restores 70 hit points to a creature. Ends blindness, deafness, and disease.

Sunbeam.effect: Beam of radiant light that blinds and damages enemies. Repeatable each turn.

Mass Suggestion.effect: Magically influence up to 12 creatures with a sentence or phrase.

Arcane Gate.effect: Create linked teleport portals between two points you can see.

Word of Recall.effect: Instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary.

Fire Storm.effect: 40-foot cube of flame, dealing 7d10 fire damage. Leaves flammable terrain ablaze.

Plane Shift.effect: Transport up to 8 willing creatures to another plane of existence.

Teleport.effect: Instantly transport to a known location anywhere in the world.

Finger of Death.effect: Deals 7d8 + 30 necrotic damage. Kills target if reduced to 0 HP.

Earthquake.effect: Creates tremors in a 100-ft radius, knocking creatures prone and destroying structures.

Sunburst.effect: Radiant explosion blinds and deals 12d6 radiant damage in a 60-ft radius.

Dominate Monster.effect: Control the actions of any creature on a failed WIS save.

Power Word Stun.effect: Instantly stuns a creature with 150 HP or fewer. No save.

True Resurrection.effect: Restore a creature to life even if dead for 200 years. Full body regenerated.

Wish.effect: Alter reality. Duplicate any spell of 8th level or lower without MP cost.

Blade Barrier.effect: Wall of spinning blades deals 6d10 slashing to creatures passing through.

Circle of Death.effect: Deals 8d6 necrotic damage in a 60-ft radius (CON save).

Chain Lightning.effect: Bolt arcs from primary target to three others; 10d8 lightning (DEX save).

Reverse Gravity.effect: Reverses gravity in a 50-ft cylinder. Creatures fall upward.

Symbol.effect: Inscribe a glyph that triggers harmful effects like pain, fear, or death.

Antimagic Field.effect: Suppress all magic in a 10-ft radius sphere around you.

Power Word Blind.effect: Blind a creature with 150 HP or less instantly. No save.

Tsunami.effect: A massive wall of water that moves and deals 6d10 bludgeoning each round.

Foresight.effect: Target gains advantage on everything; attackers have disadvantage for 8 hours.

Meteor Swarm.effect: Blazing meteors crash down, dealing 20d6 fire + 20d6 bludgeoning in four points.

Imprisonment.effect: Trap a creature in a magical prison until released.

Mass Heal.effect: Restore up to 700 HP divided as you choose among creatures.

Storm of Vengeance.effect: 10-round storm that deals various damage types over a wide area.

Gate.effect: Open a portal to another plane and summon a powerful being.

Time Stop.effect: Take 1d4+1 turns in a row. Ends if you affect another creature.
